Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

I was born on May 31, 1987 in Voronezh. I studied at the Koltsov's hymanisia. At school I got carried away with Olympiad programming. Then I graduated from the Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics of Voronezh State University as a specialty system programmer. I`m software engineer as a specialty backend-developer. I have been working since 2009. Today I am the CTO and co-founder of a Voronezh web application development company. I write in programming languages:

  • C
  • Ruby
  • Python
  • Go
  • Rust
  • TypeScript

And I use technology:

  • Ruby on Rails
  • Django
  • WebAssembly
  • Kubernetes
  • Docker
  • MySQL
  • PostgreSQL
  • AWS Lambda
  • Node.js
  • Angular
